trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANLOP115_04701_SEQ_00<tab>Managingway is having trouble managing a rapidly escalating cookbook situation.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANLOP115_04701_SEQ_01<tab>Speak with Keepingway.
TEXT_BANLOP115_04701_SEQ_02<tab>Deliver the requested items to Managingway.
TEXT_BANLOP115_04701_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Keepingway.

TEXT_BANLOP115_04701_TODO_01<tab><var 08 E4E8050A ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Managingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050B ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Managingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050C ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Managingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80509 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Managingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050D ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Managingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050E ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Managingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050F ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Managingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80510 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Managingway)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_BANLOP115_04701_MANAGINGWAY_000_001<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Pardon my plumpness, but we need printing materials, and <var 1A 02 /var>lots<var 1A 01 /var> of them.

TEXT_BANLOP115_04701_MANAGINGWAY_000_002<tab>With the establishment of the cooking station, a growing number of our Ways have developed an interest in cooking, you see, and so Cookingway decided to put together a beginner's cookbook.

TEXT_BANLOP115_04701_MANAGINGWAY_000_004<tab>Alas, with the number of would-be culinarians increasing at such speed, the cookbooks sold out in the blink of an eye, and with a dearth of the necessary printing materials, we're unable to make any more.
TEXT_BANLOP115_04701_MANAGINGWAY_000_005<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Pardon my plumpness, but we once again find ourselves with a shortage of printing materials.
TEXT_BANLOP115_04701_MANAGINGWAY_000_006<tab>Cookingway's cookbook is popular as ever, and without your help, we'll never be able to keep up with demand.
TEXT_BANLOP115_04701_MANAGINGWAY_000_007<tab>We would be duly grateful if you could speak with Keepingway yonder, and use the ingredients he has at hand to craft the necessary materials.
TEXT_BANLOP115_04701_KEEPINGWAY_000_010<tab>Here about the printing materials, yes?

TEXT_BANLOP115_04701_KEEPINGWAY_000_011<tab>Then without further ado, please use these spare parts to cast a number of matrices for the book's typesetting. Should you run out of parts, the yonder doing supporter has plenty more available.

TEXT_BANLOP115_04701_KEEPINGWAY_000_012<tab>Then without further ado, please use these lengths of wood to produce the finest quality paper carats can buy. Should you run out of wood, the yonder doing supporter has plenty more available.

TEXT_BANLOP115_04701_KEEPINGWAY_000_013<tab>Then without further ado, please use these vials filled with perfectly safe chemicals to produce a suitable ink for the book. Should you run out of ingredients, the yonder doing supporter has plenty more available.
TEXT_BANLOP115_04701_KEEPINGWAY_000_014<tab>When you've finished, please deliver the items to Managingway. Good luck!
TEXT_BANLOP115_04701_SUPPORTER4701_000_015<tab><beep> Hello there! Do you require additional materials? <boop> Ha, trick question! You already have plenty!
TEXT_BANLOP115_04701_SUPPORTER4701_000_016<tab><beep> Hello there! Do you require additional materials? <boop> Ha, trick question! You already have plenty!
TEXT_BANLOP115_04701_SUPPORTER4701_000_017<tab><beep> Hello there! Do you require additional materials? <boop> Ha, trick question! You already have plenty!
TEXT_BANLOP115_04701_SUPPORTER4701_000_018<tab><bloop> Ah, a request for materials! Okay, coming right up!
TEXT_BANLOP115_04701_SUPPORTER4701_000_019<tab><bloop> Ah, a request for materials! Okay, coming right up!
TEXT_BANLOP115_04701_SUPPORTER4701_000_020<tab><bloop> Ah, a request for materials! Okay, coming right up!
TEXT_BANLOP115_04701_MANAGINGWAY_000_021<tab>How fares the procurement of printing materials? We wouldn't want to keep those cooking hopefuls waiting for too long...
TEXT_BANLOP115_04701_MANAGINGWAY_000_022<tab>Perfect─we can restart production immediately. Thank you, as always, for rising to the occasion!
